snippet: The online e-commerce site said revenue increased 23 percent to $3.4 billion as its marketplace unit revenue rose 9 percent and PayPal revenue rose 26 percent.
abstract: EBay reports second-quarter profit of $692 million, or 53 cents a share, up 144 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue rose 23 percent to $3.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: The online e-commerce site said revenue increased 23 percent to $3.4 billion as its marketplace unit revenue rose 9 percent and PayPal revenue rose 26 percent.

headline.main: EBay Profit Soars 144% as E-Commerce Rebounds
headline.print_headline: EBay Profit Soars 144% As E-Commerce Rebounds
